author: Juan Escobar
text: 'Ordered something from here the cashier told me she would refund me because they ran out - nothing a week later they just kept my money'

author: Boo Bees
text: 'I tried the chicken sandwich! It was delicious üòã it\'s different from your average "halal" spot. The onions are caramelized not raw. The sandwich was hot and white sauce was more on the mayo tasting side. All in all I will be back!'

author: Robbie Brevard
text: 'I was parked near this place and wanted to just grab some wings from somewhere before I left Hoboken . I was very impressed with the portion size of the honey garlic wings !\nWings were amazing! I would return to try more items off their menu .'

author: Larry Qin
text: 'Great halal food complemented by pleasant service'

author: Andy Gonzalez
text: 'Just popped in for the first time
column5: the staff (maybe owner) was very friendly
column6: and the food is amazing. Very nice portions and a delicious variety of flavors in one platter!'

author: Nicholas Beyer
text: "Amazingly good platter. Falafel
column6: and hot sauce (really good spice level) were all phenomenal. Can't go wrong here"

author: F Zaidi
text: 'Amazing Chicken.  Try their chicken salad. You‚Äôll love it'

author: Robert Giesken
text: 'Mango Habanero and Sweet Chili wings are awesome. Platters are very good as well.'

author: Jared Johnson (Jared)
text: 'Delicious halal from local folks from the block. Made with clean
column5: carefully-selected ingredients that pack a punch without leaving you with guilt or a clogged toilet (like the greasier fare from the trucks can do).'

author: Aakriti Mahajan
text: 'Their red and white sauce was so good and they have crispy falafels! They have only been here for 2 months
column5: glad they joined the Hoboken area! Their wings are great too and very nice staff!'

author: Mehtaab Singh
text: 'This place was honestly amazing! The food tasted great and the portion sizes were great for the price. The staff was also very friendly
column5: and I‚Äôll be sure to return.'

author: Andrew Lee
text: 'Great service and better food'

author: Abhishek Allen
text: 'nice addition to hoboken culinary world. Their chicken over rice and sandwich are better than halal guys and they don‚Äôt skimp on the red and white sauces. I have been going there once every week now. Good quality and well priced food items.'

author: Zack Halilovic
text: 'Glad to see a new Halal restaurant in Hoboken. I got the chicken wings and they were everything I could‚Äôve asked for: affordable
column6: and tasty. Will definitely be a place I eat often at.'

author: Lucky Blessed
text: 'Best chicken platter everüòçüòçüòçüòç absolutely deliciousüòçüòçüòç !!!!!!üòç'

author: CARLOS T
text: 'Do yourself a favor and come on by.\n\nYour welcome'

author: Swati Saxena
text: 'One of the best Falafel'

author: Mike E.
text: "Went there last Friday night with my two other friends for take out. I got myself a mixed platter and gave a small tip
column5: I asked for 2 extra empty containers to fill with white sauce they had on the table and they young guy working there with brown (curly?) hair gave me attitude and he threw it hard in my bag... I understand if it costs extra just lmk I would've just paid for it
column6: the food is good and the rest of the staff seem friendly. Heard a lot about this place just a bummer I didn't get the best customer service :/"

author: Matt D'Amico
text: 'Good platters and really good wings. Clean kitchen and friendly

author: Nick Scolaro
text: 'platter was excellent'

author: Josh
text: 'best platter in hoboken/jersey city for sure'

author: Kshitij Khot
text: 'The best falafel sandwich I have had in my 7 years in NJ/NY\nVery welcoming staff and awesome food.\nWhat else you need!!! Love this place.'

author: habib ahmad
text: 'Food was very good definitely Lives up to it‚Äôs name!'

author: Darek Michael
text: 'Stopped by yesterday for a mixed platter and it was delicious! Would recommend white & hot sauce for the first timers! Thanks Mateen üôå'

author: Michael Marando
text: 'Best addition to hoboken!!!! Chicken platter with everything!!!! 10/10'

author: fae bee
text: 'I got the chicken sandwich and it was delicious! Super filling but not greasy at all. Amazing quality at great prices. I can‚Äôt wait to come back and try the wings and more dishes! So impressed üòä'
